For internal use only
Subject: International case: information/documents required
Dear ATM team,
The chargeback team is in the process of reviewing the internal case containing the following details:
Case ID:
Merchant name (ATM location):
Terminal number:
Card number:
Operation date:
ARN:
Operation amount/currency:
Disputed amount/currency:
RC:
Authorization code:
To be able to make a final decision on the case we kindly request a copy of the ATM transaction record/a copy of the ATM audit tape/an internal transaction log. [Choose the appropriate variant or type your own variant]
Because responses to dispute messages are time-sensitive according to Visa/MasterCard rules, we would greatly appreciate if you could review the case and reply before [specify the date].
Sincerely yours,
Chargeback team
